field.name: assessment_methodology
field.title: Assessment methodology
field.default:
The assessment of regional coherence (hereinafter: Coherence) evaluates the relationships between the reports of the Member States, within each marine region or subregion.

For the 2018 reporting exercise, Member States reported using the criteria and methodological standards on good environmental status of marine waters, and specifications and standardised methods for monitoring and assessment laid down in Commission Decision (EU) 2017/848. An assessment framework was developed on the Directiveâ€™s key concepts and the standards established by the Commission Decision. For each article, a set of assessment questions was defined to structure the assessment exercise. Each assessment question was scored based on the degree to which the broad assessment criteria were met by the reported information. The assessment was carried out through an online tool.

The assessment was based on the e-reporting information (xml and shapefiles) provided by the Member State. Any text reports submitted were not consulted.
